text:
Thoracic succussion splash: a new symptom and sign of achalasia.
 A patient with a "thoracic succussion splash" due to achalasia is described.
 She noted a splashing or sloshing sensation in her chest related to jogging and bending.
 On examination a splashing sound could be heard over the mid sternum and the posterior chest when the patient was rocked vigorously back and forth.
